text: The 2016 World RX of France was the eighth round of the third season of the FIA World Rallycross Championship. The event was held at the Circuit de Lohéac in the Lohéac commune of Bretagne. ==Supercar== ===Heats=== Qualifying 2 Race 5 The circuit split between the regular lap and the Joker lap {| class=wikitable style="font-size:95%" ! ! !
